==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|表|沙|汰}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おもてざた|表|tr1=omote|t1=front; on the surface, in the open|沙汰|tr2=sata|t2=an action, an event}}. The ''sata'' changes to ''zata'' due to {{rendaku|おもてざた}}.

===Pronunciation===
* Compound: [[訓読み|kun'yomi]] for the {{l|ja|表|tr=''omote''}} portion, [[音読み|on'yomi]] for the {{l|ja|沙汰|tr=''sata''}} portion.
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[o̞mo̞te̞ za̠ta̠]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おもてざた}}

# something that has come out into the [[open]]: a [[public]] [[incident]], something that is [[public]] [[knowledge]]
#: {{ja-usex|その件は'''表沙汰'''にするな。|その けん は '''おもてざた''' に する な。|Don't '''air your [[dirty laundry]]''' / bring it out '''into the open'''. → Keep it private.}}
# an [[issue]] brought before a [[court]] or other public institution
#: {{ja-usex|相続争いを'''表沙汰'''にする|そうぞく あらそい を '''おもてざた''' に する|to take an inheritance dispute '''public''' / '''to court'''}}
